content: I noticed something odd in the MIR generated for a simple match (this is from mir_promoted query) where the first branch is compiled slightly differently. This also leads to different facts being generated for polonius and other weirdnesses. It doesn't seem to cause any issues but I'm confused as to why this would occur. I posted example MIR here: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/183875-wg-formal-methods/topic/Inconsistency.20in.20MIR.20for.20branches/near/214769775
